ref.div: IPCC. Summary for policymakers. In: Stocker TF, Qin D, Plattner GK, Tignor M, Allen SK, Boschung J, Nauels A, Xia Y, Bex V, Midgley PM, editors. [Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, United Kingdom and New York, NY, USA; 2013.
